name: Frizzle
storyline:
Unravel the dark secret within Frizzle, a small but captivating virtual pet game for the Panic Playdate. While the pixelated world promises warmth and companionship, an unsettling undercurrent simmers beneath the surface. As you nurture your digital friend, a struggle for dominance unfolds, forcing you to question everything you thought you knew.

Will you follow the whim of a mysterious and desperate game developer, or succumb to the ever-growing influence of your virtual companion? The choice is yours, but beware – the line between love and control is easily blurred.
